resources.string: HAPPY BIRTHDAY to the girl with big heart❤️, charming face🤗, most beautiful smile😍and with lots of talent😄. Koi itna perfect kaise hoi sakathe just look at you. Your parents must be proud ki unlog ture jaise beti pain. Ture janam k baad sab jitna khusi hue rahe usse jada khusi ture tarakki se ture CA bane se v hoe aise ham wish karithe. I know tu bahut mehnat karathe💪 and I wish ki ture mehnat se thoda se jada hi fal mile tuka. Ham mehnat se jada fal diye me biswas to nai krithe but ture liye itna pray kr skithe ham. Genuinely i nvr prayed for me but i have alwaz prayed for u ki ture sath axa hoe jab v or aise hi pray krte rahib. Its not bcoz ki hamka ture upar sak hai ki tu nai kar sakathe bolke🤦‍♂️ but i pray bcoz i want to see you happy🥀. As u grow up jimmedari aijathe but i know u r capable of handeling all the upcoming circumstances in your life and you will keep your parents happy as well. A happy person can only make others happy so agr parents ka ya dusre ka happy karek chahthe so first make sure you are happy with yourself😇.I just wish ki tuka sara khusi mile jo tu deserver karathe , may you get all the love you ever wished and craved for. Ultimately tu sab achieve krilihe i know itna bharosa he hmka ture upar and i wish ki oo sab process jldi complete hoe or jaldi jaldi tarakki hoe ture. Ham v ture tarakki hi dekhek chahithe i want you to be successful. Hamre company ma CA rakhib tab tuka 😂. Jokes apart HAPPIEST BIRTHDAY TO YOU . Hope you like my small free of cost gift made with my lots of effort, time and love. Keep blooming like flower🌺 and spread essence of your charm🫣.
